title: Branding
description: no, Coca-Cola is not actually green. It does not get dyed brown to look different in a bottle. It's never been green, and the color has actually never been changed.

title: Developers love it
description: Love the great taste of Coca-Cola? Meet Coca-Cola Energy. It's the first energy drink launched under the Coca-Cola brand, and it's made for people just like you.
